name: Never Apart
description:
This game is heavily inspired by the PT Demo.  You play the sole survivor of the serial killer Darren Bar.  In this dimension, you are stuck in a repeating apartment floor haunted by Darren.  It is a PC build and requires a download.  Test it out and please feel free to leave me a comment!

It wasn't till after the build that I realized I forgot to hide the cursor and add an escape/quit button.  Sorry but will add soon.
